title: Available Now! 1 Bedroom Apartments at Modera Observatory Park
posting_body: Stretch out in your spacious new 1 bed 1 bath apartment at Modera Observatory Park.
This popular floor plan is now available for as low as $1,910.00 a month.
Give us a call or stop by to check out all of the amenities.
Minutes to Observatory Park & Washington Park
Blocks to the University Station light rail
Walk to dozens of restaurants, pubs, coffee shops, and lounges
Complete online leasing, maintenance requests, and rent payments
Minutes to the Denver Tech Center
Outdoor fire pit, BBQ, and seating area
Awesome location at the gateway of Denver's prestigious Observatory Park neighborhood
Top floor deck with Downtown and mountain views
Private work rooms with flat screen TV's
Lobby screen featuring real-time public transportation options
Take a spin, stretch or meditate in the fitness studio
Dedicated game lounge with foosball and shuffleboard
Entertain friends and family in the party pod
Your daily grind should be a trip to our coffee bar
Pamper your pet at our pet spa
Bike around Denver and store your bike in our bike storage
Join in on the fun with organized resident events
Two-story fitness studio with climbing rock apparatus
We love your furry companions and welcome up to two per apartment home.
While we are huge fans of individuality (and the exotic), we have to ask that exotic pals, such as skunks and ferrets, find happy homes with a friend or family member.
Please note that we reserve the right to disallow certain aggressive breeds of dogs and aquariums as per our pet addendum.
Please contact our leasing office for information.
